title: Task 1: Describe visual or contextual elements of a work of art, including: form, style, materials, content, function, context, siting/physical context, subject matter, or reception of a work of art.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately describe a material OR architectural element used in the construction of the structure.
Response accurately describes ONE material OR architectural element used in the construction of the structure.
Response accurately describes TWO materials OR architectural elements used in the construction of the structure.

title: Task 2: Using specific evidence, explains how a specific work of art (or group of related works) demonstrates continuity within an artistic tradition, style, or practice OR using specific evidence, explains how a specific work of art (or group of related works) demonstrates change within an artistic tradition, style, or prac
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use specific visual evidence to explain how the design of the structure or the organization of the interior space references OR departs from a related earlier architectural tradition.

Response accurately uses ONE example of specific visual evidence to explain how the design of the structure or the organization of the interior space references OR departs from a related earlier architectural tradition.

Response accurately uses TWO examples of specific visual evidence to explain how the design of the structure or the organization of the interior space references OR departs from a related earlier architectural tradition.

title: Task 3: Explain the meaning or significance of continuity and/or change between works of art within a related artistic tradition, style and/or practice.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately use specific contextual evidence to explain an effect Hadid intended to achieve through her choice to either reference or depart from a related, earlier architectural tradition.
Response accurately uses specific evidence to explain an effect Hadid intended to achieve through her choice to either reference or depart from a related, earlier architectural tradition.
